posts.post_content:

E. Collins - EPDG - SGC 40
Kiernan - Old Mill - SGC 35
Willis

I'm interested in the Evers with cuts on his shirt. lol
Do let me know what you want for it and scans also.

Phil

[quote name="Texxxx" post=1157093]I'm interested in the Evers with cuts on his shirt. lol
Do let me know what you want for it and scans also.[/QUOTE]

Ack!  My typing is generally better than that.  But I'll leave the listing alone to remind me to do better next time.

There was a TREMENDOUS number of inquiries about the Collins; therefore this card will be going to an auction house.  

Evers will probably be available.  My thoughts now are about $325... scans will be up early next week.
scans and pricing available; cards arrived early

If the Evers is the one in your other post then I am going to pass. If not send scans.
